amendment.description: At the end of section 2, add the following new subsection: (e) MOTERIZED ACCESS IN EMERGENCIES.--.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rahall amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Rahall.
Amendment agreed to by House: On agreeing to the Rahall amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Rahall amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
